channel.title: Tips and tricks in Auxy
channel.description:
It should be nice to start this as a category. It will allow to share any feature that you would like to share. It will allow to learn more about how to use our great tool ;-) Example: Did you noticed that the order of the instrument is changing the rendering ?
Thanks

item.title: Tips and tricks in Auxy
item.dc:creator: Oli4-8
item.description:
I mean that looks like if I want to have more drums then it should be in top one as example, am I wrong?

Read full topic
